game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the dungeon.
game.description: Rumor has it that a powerful artifact is concealed within the depths of an abandoned dungeon. Retrieve it and bring glory to our kingdom.

task.objective: Gather information about the dungeon's location from the local tavern.
task.description: Speak with the barkeep and other patrons to learn the entrance's whereabouts.

task.objective: Explore the dungeon and defeat the guardian monster.
task.description: The artifact is protected by a fearsome creature. You must overcome it to claim the prize.
